xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.4 Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.4.3 Abyākatapada » 2.4.3.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Hetusahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
69.
1401Hetu ceva sahetuko ca abyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
70.
1402Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1403Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1404Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1405(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1406Hetusahetukadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Hetuup2.5 Hetuhetusampayuttaduka, Kusalattika >>
